import visTypeXyObj from './vis_type_xy.devdocs.json';

Contains the new xy-axis chart using the elastic-charts library, which will eventually replace the vislib xy-axis charts including bar, area, and line.

Contact [@elastic/kibana-visualizations](https://github.com/orgs/elastic/teams/kibana-visualizations) for questions regarding this plugin.
